repos.description: My personal environment.  If you're me, just run `git clone --recursive https://github.com/sboparen/env && env/install.sh` to set up a new machine.
repos.name: env

repos.description: My window manager, forked from [dwm](http://dwm.suckless.org). Somehow I gave it even more of a minimalist aesthetic.
repos.name: dwm

repos.description: This script lets you snooze emails in your Gmail. The email is archived, but will reappear in a set number of days. If you use Inbox Zero, you might like this a lot.  Based on <https://gmailblog.blogspot.ca/2011/07/gmail-snooze-with-apps-script.html>.
repos.name: gmail-snooze

repos.description: Use your favourite text editor to rename files! I haven't changed the code since 2011, but I'm still using it over five years later.
repos.name: ren

repos.description: My entry for the 2011 [International Obfuscated C Code Contest](http://ioccc.org/).  See the included README for spoilers.
repos.name: 1k-codec

repos.description: Learning how to use WebGL to make virtual reality experiences.
repos.name: vrdemo

repos.description: My fork of OpenITG, with some minor but important changes, mostly for the [UW DDR Club](https://www.facebook.com/UWDDR/).
repos.name: openitg

repos.description: Scripts which generate a webpage to compare your SpaceChem solutions with the best on SolutionNet, or with your chosen rival(s).
repos.name: spacechem

repos.description: My fork of [StepMania](https://www.stepmania.com/), optimized for editing and maybe even playing charts designed for ITG.
repos.name: stepmania

repos.description: Scripts and custom puzzles for the game [TIS-100](http://www.zachtronics.com/tis-100/).
repos.name: tis100
